mapper.insert: INSERT INTO email_verification ( email, member_type, userid, corp_userid, verification_code, created_at, expires_at, verified) VALUES ( #{email}, #{memberType}, #{userid}, #{corpUserId}, #{verificationCode}, #{createdAt}, #{expiresAt}, #{verified})
mapper.select: SELECT verification_id, email, member_type, userid, corp_userid, verification_code, created_at, expires_at, verified FROM email_verification WHERE email = #{email} AND member_type = #{memberType} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
